Module org.softsmithy.lib.swing

Package org.softsmithy.lib.swing.action

Utility classes and extensions for the Swing Action Framework.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    XAction
    XAction extends Action by defining more property keys and convenience methods.
    Note: The API may change in a future version!
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractXAction
    This class provides defaul implementations for the XAction interface.
    Note: The API may change in a future version!
    ActionWrapper  
    DefaultXAction
    Provides an empty actionPerformed method body.
    DevelopmentActionFactory
    A factory for the standard development actions.
    GeneralActionFactory
    A factory for the general standard actions.
    IconType
    A typesafe enum class.
    MediaActionFactory
    A factory for the standard media actions.
    NavigationActionFactory
    A factory for the standard navigation actions.
    ReflectiveXAction
    A trampoline class that reflectivly calls an action method.
    StandardActionFactory
    A base class for standard action factories.
    TableActionFactory
    A factory for the standard table actions.
    TextActionFactory
    A factory for the standard text actions.
    XActions
    A utility class for XActions.
    XActionWrapper
